p: Results: The incidents rates of accidental removal of invasive devices were reviewed of ICU through the database nursing department of our hospital. The period of diagnostic described 76 events of accidental removal of invasive devices; 13 into the bad-washing (rate: 1.18 adjusted events per year). In the evaluation period, 60 events are reported and 7 during the bed-washing (rate: 0.64 adjusted events per year). The rates showed significant differences in the totals events (p = 0.02). To compare rates of bed-washing events, a significant difference was observed in relation to the change of protocol (p = 0.04).
